revised_title: Axisymmetric Flow Field Induced by a Point Force Near a Plane Wall
tldr: This article presents a numerical solution to the Navier-Stokes equations for the flow field generated by a point force near a plane wall. The study focuses on the effects of the force's direction and magnitude on the flow patterns and streamline behavior. The findings have applications in understanding fluid motion in various scenarios, such as insect flight and acoustic streaming.
